Scarlett Larouge

Juicy good reads

Scarlett Larouge is a Southern belle interested in erotica, mystery, historical fiction, paranormal, and romance. She enjoys traveling, exploring abandoned places, and collecting art and secrets. When not working on her writing, she can be found shamelessly flirting with friends, acquaintances, and handsome strangers.
